snippet: Darren Aronofsky explains why he decided to take on the fantastical Bible story in his new film and curate an art show about it.
abstract: Darren Aronofsky explains why he decided to take on the fantastical Bible story in his new film and curate an art show about it.

headline.main: Art Matters | The Thing About Noah and the Ark
headline.print_headline: The Thing About Noah and the Ark
